biography.summary: Tina Smith is an American politician serving as the junior United States Senator from Minnesota since 2018. She was appointed to fill the Senate seat and later won election to continue serving.

contact.office_address: 720 Hart Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

timeline.event: Appointed to the U.S. Senate to fill the vacancy following the resignation of Senator Al Franken.
Elected in a special election to complete the remainder of the term.
Continued service in the U.S. Senate after term start.
